pr_title: Extracting interface from `IndexFieldTypePoller` to encapsulate ES-specifics.

timeline.bodyText: Why not use IndexFieldTypesDTO here instead of just Map<String, String>? I think it would communicate the method's purpose more clearly.
timeline.author: alex-konn
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,26 @@
+/**

+package org.graylog2.indexer.fieldtypes;
+
+import com.codahale.metrics.Timer;
+
+import java.util.Map;
+import java.util.Optional;
+
+public interface IndexFieldTypePollerAdapter {
+    Optional<Map<String, String>> pollIndex(String indexName, Timer pollTimer);

replies.bodyText: I replaced it with Set<FieldTypeDTO>. We can easily construct a IndexFieldTypesDTO out of it, but it requires knowing the index set id which should not needed for the adapter.
replies.author: dennisoelkers
